payload.name: work-graphs-as-dags
payload.title: Work graphs as DAGs: ordering must be explicit and replayable
payload.formal: represent work as state machines + DAG edges; replay derives state.
payload.apm2_mapping: the work module already includes parent_work_ids and immutable spec_snapshot_hash. The right posture is: **work is a replayable automaton**, not a chat log. “Conversation” is a projection; the ledger is truth.
